scripts.build: vite build && vite build --config vite.pdfjs.config.ts && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs dist/chunks/pdf.worker.min.mjs && vite build --config vite.content.config.ts
scripts.build:firefox: vite build --config vite.config.firefox.ts && vite build --config vite.pdfjs.config.ts && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs dist/chunks/pdf.worker.min.mjs && vite build --config vite.content.config.ts --outDir dist-firefox
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:firefox
scripts.format: echo 'Format check placeholder - add prettier/biome if needed'
scripts.size: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const du=(p)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(p))return 0;const s=fs.statSync(p);return s.isDirectory()?fs.readdirSync(p).reduce((a,f)=>a+du(p+'/'+f),0):s.size};const d=du('dist');const m=5*1024*1024;console.log('Bundle size:',Math.round(d/1024)+'KB','/',Math.round(m/1024)+'KB');if(d>m){console.error('❌ Bundle exceeds 5MB limit');process.exit(1)}else{console.log('✅ Bundle size OK')}"
